name: Minority Rights Group
legal: Registered UK Charity and Company Limited by Guarantee
goal: MRG works to secure the rights of ethnic, religious and linguistic minorities and indigenous peoples and to promote cooperation between communities
interests: Audiovisual and Media, Culture, Development, Enlargement, External Relations, Home Affairs, Humanitarian Aid, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Regional Policy
euInitiatives: EIDHR, Fundamental Rights Agency, External Action Service, Human Rights Policies, Neighbourhood Policy, Southern Mediterranean Region Policy, Development Education Policy and Initiatives, Conflict Prevention Initiatives
